T04n1047u_001:2: ye hi jinā viditānutpādatve'pi vyavahāramukhapūrṇakaruṇayā saṃsṛtisahasre sukhena lokarakṣaṇāyeha pratipannā api nirmalamatayastānahaṃ sadā praṇamāmi ||
T04n1047u_001:6: paramārtho niṣprapañcaḥ kartavyo dvividhaḥ sa ca || 2 ||
T04n1047u_001:8: sa ca syātprathamo dvedhā jātiparyāyavastu ca || 3 ||
T04n1047u_001:14: etādṛk paramārtho hi yathābhāse tu saṃvṛtiḥ || 6 ||
T04n1047u_001:15: dvividhā sāpi vijñeyā mithyābhūtā ca saṃvṛtiḥ |
T04n1047u_001:18: mithyābhūtā saṃvṛtiḥ syādvijñeyā dvividhā ca sā ||8 ||
T04n1047u_001:21: tena satyaṃ dvidhā sarva sāmastyena tu dṛśyate |
T04n1047u_001:22: upādāya tadarthaṃ hi sarvā prāpnoti sampadam ||10 ||
T04n1047u_001:24: kalyāṇo yaḥ sa sattvasya sādhayatvāśu cintitam || 11 ||
